pr_title: [#10806] [UI issue][Help for instructor page][Questions section] non uniformity in the full stop at the end of the sentence

timeline.bodyText: Why do we add additional spacing?
timeline.author: ChooJeremy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -591,28 +591,28 @@

Setting Up Questions

  1. - Specify the question text + Specify the question text.
  2. - (Optional) Add a description for the question + (Optional) Add a description for the question.
  3. - List the options for respondents to rank + List the options for respondents to rank.
  4. - (Optional) Allow respondents to give the same rank to multiple options + (Optional) Allow respondents to give the same rank to multiple options.
  5. - (Optional) Set the minimum and/or maximum number of options a respondent should rank — setting these values ensures that respondents will rank your desired number of options + (Optional) Set the minimum and/or maximum number of options a respondent should rank — setting these values ensures that respondents will rank your desired number of options.
  6. - Specify the feedback path that should be used to generate the appropriate feedback recipients + Specify the feedback path that should be used to generate the appropriate feedback recipients.

timeline.message: Add punctuation to all sections in instructor help page
